title: Eugene Onegin
brief_description: The rustic charm and palatial splendour of Tsarist Russia is the background for Pushkin’s hauntingly romantic drama “Eugene Onegin”, set to Tchaikovsky’s beautiful score. This live recording from Chicago’s Lyric Opera boasts an internationally renowned cast led by Mirella Freni as Tatania and Wolfgang Brendel in the challenging role. Rated: G
